Articles.Content: I want to see somebody make a homemade Satellite around jool. No Cheats. No nothing. #ICantmakerockets
I mean this respectfully, but it is not a huge deal for a player with a bit of experience to get a satellite to Jool. People have gone there and back in a single stage.
I know, I just wanted to give a challenge to Less experienced players.

I managed to make a 3 stage probe that used a twin boar, nuke and spark that got into a high Jool orbit soon after I got the game, although I played the demo for a while before that.

Hopefully there is a picture below, which shows the final stage of the probe, Jool and the three major moons, Laythe, Tylo and Vall (or the Kalilean moons, as I call them). 

http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198324818929/screenshot/156899965730687622

Edited March 27, 2017 by CaptainTrebor
Picture?

I have a Jool 5 in my signature. Not finished because the entry wasn't made right and I decided that it wasn't worth it to finish it if I wouldn't get the award but I did complete a Jool V. It isn't a probe, but it is a little more.

Fire

There is already a Fancy Probes Challenge by @eloquentJane which is picking up a good few entries (and the OP needs updating with my mission ), and although it doesn't directly call for a mission to Jool it really does wrap this challenge into it, with an imaginative and well thought out set of guidelines:

I happened to choose Jool as my destination FWIW:

SM
It is impossible to land on Jool, so if you were talking about sending a lander, it wouldn't make sense.
